scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd nlp-chat-client && npm start"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd nlp-chat-client && npm start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd nlp-chat-client && npm run build"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: concurrently "npm install" "cd backend && npm install" "cd nlp-chat-client && npm install"
